Question: This person and Butchart brought the aircraft into a nose-down alignment to increase speed, then launched the Skyrocket.
Hints: This person married his first wife Janet Shearon on January 28, 1956.
At the bottom of the ladder, this person said "I'm going to step off the LEM now" (referring to the Apollo Lunar Module).
In the late 1950s, this person applied at a local Methodist church to lead a Boy Scout troop.
